- Provide override for Get Capacitance method defined by parent

item.title: Instruments v1.4.0.51
item.description:
Product: Instruments v1.4.0.51
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 06 Jan 2020 17:43:24 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.4.0.51]
This release defines several new instrument types and new abstract API methods:

Capacitance Bridge:
- Get Capacitance
- Set Capacitance

Strain Cell:
- Get Strain
- Set Strain

Optical Delay Line:
- Get Delay
- Set Delay
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Cryostation v1.1.0.6
item.description:
Product: Cryostation v1.1.0.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 06 Jan 2020 16:45:11 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging Montana Instruments Cryostation status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for getting information from the Cryostation.

Release Notes: [1.1.0.6]
- now monitoring all temperature stages and chamber pressure
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.3.2.49
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.8.32
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.8.32
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 20 Dec 2019 07:17:10 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging PPMS status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for controlling the magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (for PPM2)

Release Notes: [1.4.8.32]
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.3.2.49
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.2.4
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.2.4
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 20 Dec 2019 07:00:17 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.9.2.4]
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.3.2.49
-- change how RemoteControl process is started
- fix several bugs in API
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instruments v1.3.2.49

Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.3.2.49]
- RemoteControl process should now stay hidden when started
- Fix bug that would not properly set port for STM listener
